overview:
Jason is an entrepreneur.

He is Co-Founder and President of Covideo, a video email service for Mac and PC users that includes companion piece iPhone and Android apps.

Shortly after graduating from Purdue University in 2003 with a BS in Computer Science, Jason had his first exposure to startups through consulting work. Those experiences sparked an interest in developing his own business. The opportunity came just months later, when he and another Purdue alum teamed up to launch Covideo, a personal mission to help people communicate better through video. The first few years Jason devoted his time to bringing a quality product to market. The past 2 years, Jason has focused on adding social features to the product, enabling people to communicate more easily than ever before.
